news.title: YouTube Unsupported
news.message: YouTube is no longer supported due to updated platform detection methods. We are investigating potential solutions, but there is no ETA for a resolution.

news.title: Some audio codecs broken
news.message: The following audio codes are broken due to an ffmpeg misconfiguration: OGG, OPUS, FLAC. A fix will be pushed @ 20:00 UTC (June 21st)
